sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-radio-group :disabled="isDisabled" @change="doChange" v-model="radioSelectValue">
    <el-radio :label="item.code" @click.native.prevent="radioClick(item.code)" v-for="item in options">
      {{item.codename}}
    </el-radio>
  </el-radio-group>
</template>

<script>

  import {mapGetters} from 'vuex'

  export default {
    name: 'Radio',
    props: {
      codetype: {
        type: String,
        required: true
      },
      filter: {
        type: String,
        required: false
      },
      disabled: {
        type: Boolean,
        required: false
      },
      value: {
        type: String
      },
      isRequired: {
        type: Boolean,
        required: false,
        default: false
      },
      changeMethod: {
        type: Function,
        required: false
      }
    },
    mounted() {
      this.options = this.ldcodes[this.codetype]
      if (this.filter) {
        this.options = this.filterOptions(this.filter, this.options)
      }
      this.radioSelectValue = this.value
      if (this.disabled) {
        this.isDisabled = this.disabled
      }
    },
    methods: {
      radioClick(e) {
        if (this.isDisabled === true) return
        if (!this.isRequired) {
          e === this.radioSelectValue ? (this.radioSelectValue = '') : (this.radioSelectValue = e)
        } else {
          this.radioSelectValue = e;
        }
        if (!(this.radioSelectValue === '')) {
          if (this.changeMethod) {
            this.changeMethod(this.radioSelectValue);
          }
        }

      },
      doChange(val) {
        this.$emit('change', val)
      },
      handleCancel(value) {
        this.radioSelectValue = value === this.radioSelectValue ? '' : value
      }
    },
    data() {
      return {
        options: [],
        radioSelectValue: '',
        isDisabled: false
      }
    },
    watch: {
      value(val, oldVal) {
        this.radioSelectValue = val
      },
      radioSelectValue(val, oldVal) {
        if (val != oldVal) {
          this.$emit('input', this.radioSelectValue);
        }
      },
      disabled(val, oldVal) {
        if (val != oldVal) {
          this.isDisabled = val
        }
      }
    },
    computed: {
      ...mapGetters([
        'ldcodes'
      ])
    }
  }
</script>

<style>

</style>
